cause.description:
If we take action to improve the health of the southern resident killer whales who are officially endangered due to human hazardous behaviors then we can improve all life. The killer whales that roam the pacific northwest are the most contaminated life on the planet. Hopefully we can change our behaviors to improve the health of all.
You can learn all about the cause by visiting http://www.orcanetwork.org
1. Southern resident orcas (fish eating) are a unique family of killer whale who are listed as "endangered" by both Canadian and US governments. There are 86 individuals in the group
2. Transient Killer Whales (meat eating) are officially the most contaminated of all orca species
3. We need to change our behaviors to help restore a healthy world
cause.mission: To protect pacific northwest killer whales, ultimately protecting all life. To educate and spread awareness.
cause.name: Protect Killer Whales
